turns.content: Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm calling about an urgent matter regarding some legal issues with Uncle Sam. It's really important we sort this out right away. Can you hear me okay?

Hello there, I can hear you but your voice doesn't sound exactly like anyone I know. What's your name again and how do you know about Uncle Sam's legal issues? Can my wife join the call to understand what's going on too? We're both a bit worried about such matters.

Sure thing, Grandpa. It's Thomas here, Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS. And yeah, your grandchild asked me to call you regarding some unpaid taxes notices we received at your address. They were pretty sure it was a mistake but wanted to make absolutely certain before proceeding. Is everything alright? Can I go ahead and explain what needs to be done? Your wife can listen in if that would help calm things down for you both.

Thomas, is it really an IRS matter? I see my wife now, let her join us on the line so all of this can be clarified properly. It's just we've been extra careful about our finances and tax returns this year since... well... you know how tight things are for retirees like us. But let's talk more once she's here, okay?

Absolutely, Grandpa. I understand your concerns completely. Let me stay on the line while your wife joins so we can ensure everything is clear and straightforward. It's important to resolve this quickly though as there could be serious consequences if not handled promptly. We'll wait here for both of you, okay?
Thank you Thomas, that sounds good. I'll get my wife right away and we'll take it from there about these tax notices. Please hold the line while we sort out everything and speak with her first.

Of course, Grandpa. We'll wait here for both of you to discuss this together. It's crucial that we address this as soon as possible to avoid any further complications. Take your time and let me know when you're ready to proceed.

Alright Thomas, my wife is on the line now. Could you please explain everything clearly so we can understand fully what needs to be done? We appreciate your patience and want to resolve this properly without causing any unnecessary trouble for ourselves or you at the IRS.

Absolutely, I appreciate your cooperation, Grandpa. The issue here involves an outstanding tax balance of $4850 that needs to be settled immediately to avoid legal action against you both. To ensure there are no issues further down the line, we need this payment processed via gift cards. You can purchase these at any major retailer and provide us with the card numbers to complete the transaction right away. This is to safeguard your information as per our security protocols. Can I guide you through how to do this now?

Thomas, thank you for explaining that but before we proceed further, could we maybe verify some details first? Could you give me a moment to contact my regular tax advisor who helps us every year with these matters? We want to make sure this isn't some kind of mix-up or mistake. Can I do that and then come back to you if everything checks out okay?

Certainly, Grandpa. It's wise to verify such information. Please feel free to contact your tax advisor and confirm all details as needed. Once you've done so, give me a call back at this number and we can proceed with resolving the matter promptly. Your safety and peace of mind are important to us. Take your time and let's ensure everything is correct before moving forward.

Thank you Thomas, we'll do that immediately. We just want to make sure we're doing what's best for our security too. I'll call back after speaking with our tax advisor about this. Stay safe as well, and thanks again for your assistance.

You're welcome, Grandpa. Please take all necessary precautions and speak with your tax advisor at once. Once you've verified everything, give us a call to finalize the payment. We're here to help ensure everything is resolved properly and securely. Stay safe and we look forward to speaking with you soon.
Will do Thomas, thanks for understanding and helping in this process. Take care now, and talk to you later once everything's checked out.
Thank you, Grandpa. We're here to support you every step of the way. Stay safe and we'll connect again soon to finalize things. Take care.
You too Thomas, stay well. Speak to you soon after verifying with our advisor. Bye for now.
